post.body: They are going to be printing a heck of a lot more $$. I can't even imagine a trillion!
In the motorcyling world, posers are called "squids." Those who think they can ride, but really can't. :^D
What did it REALLY say? The advice is priceless. Haha
Well, @stephanieschopp apparently got a warm grade. The rest of us will need fleece, and lots of it!
We can make snow balls and throw them at all the "warm people!"
Ha, well congrats on being warm. I'll have to be nicer. (^: Here in the Bay Area, 40-something is way too cold!
According to Twitemperature, I have issues. LOL!
#resolutions I also resolve to recruit more companies to benefits of social media. Many companies today are still reticent.
#resolutions I resolve to comment more on the articles that interest me and be part of/lead the conversation.
@mediaphyter Oh, I'm a troublemaker, just not in PR. :P
I think that's hilarious.
AGREED! That's exactly what I tell people. They are amazing creatures. Mine loves to cuddle, take showers with me and play!
I am a huge fan of the orig Star Wars movies. Have every sound and line memorized. Yes, I'm a nerd. The new ones tho, oye, shiver.
Haha -- yeah, they're sneaky little critters!
Oops, was thinking of Hayden Christensen--can't keep track of these teeny bopper heart throbs! Bale was considered for role tho.
@mediaphyter Don't like Christian Bale after he buchered the role of Darth Vador.
Ha, funny. I've never given my parrot soda! Maybe it would encourage him to say a few words. Heh.
Hope you heal quickly! Did you have your tonsils out?
I'm sure CB would say stay home! (^:
DOOOD! I'll bring it!
Haha, love it! Wonder what family members are thinking of fam members twittering during "family time." Heh.
Not yet, just logged on to show fam twitter. As you know, hard to explain! (^;
How did your dinner turn out?
That's ridiculous, never heard that before. In fact, some biographers have called Hitler ignorant of economics.
RT @kpedraja @Scobleizer Blaming PR firms 4 broken embargoes is like blaming pedestrians who get run over in crosswalks-we don't break rules
Whoa... RT @BreakingNewz Obama considers $1 trillion plan to jolt economy http://is.gd/cdCS
Uh oh, I'm at 666 followers. I think Arrington is sending some bad juju my way.
What's ur twitemperature? http://adjix.com/psk Mine? "Wow, you're frigid. Maybe U should consider seeing a therapist about that last tweet."
Need help creating a resume? Check out Resume Donkey, launched today by @morganb http://www.resumedonkey.com/
RT @mediabistro We'd love to know what your "Media New Year's Resolutions" are for 2009. Let us know! Tag them with #resolutions
RT @smallbiztrends Share an outrageously creative money-saving or biz growth tip 4 inclusion in downloadable PDF: http://tinyurl.com/3m6jwd
RT @Tweeples_Mark Looking 4 a coder. If U know of excellent, hard working coders please pass along their contact info.
RT @liam_in_sf Xmas is making ppl crazy! RT @sfwriter This letter from a PR agency prez goes into the OMG category: http://budurl.com/uqvl
Ok, REALLY hate those Sarah Mclachlan PSAs re: animals needing help. Have to change the channel each time. Heart animals, but PSAs too much.
RT @TechCrunch Companies hiring on CrunchBoard: Digg, Dictionary.com, CBS, Hulu, and TechCrunch http://twurl.nl/cgc83t
The amount of cookies, fudge, food I got from family this year is unprecedented! No way I can even come close to finishing everything.
Welcome to all my new twiends! Be sure to intro yourself and say hello! (^:
Hello all! Everyone survive the holiday rush? I'm finally getting on twitter, FB, e-mail, etc. Have a lot of catchup!
Showing family what twitter is.
Merry Christmas to everyone!!
